verses.roman:
āra dine sabe meli' prabhura caraṇe
haridāsa lāgi, kichu kailā nivedane

synonyms: āra dine—the next day; sabe meli'-all the devotees, coming together; prabhura caraṇe—unto the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haridāsa lāgi—on behalf of Junior Haridāsa; kichu—some; kailā nivedane—submitted petition.
translation: The next day, all the devotees together approached the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to submit an appeal on behalf of Junior Haridāsa.
